roleset.name: smile painfully
roleset.note: GRIMACE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'grimace' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entry 40.2 (from grimace.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: clear source of pain
example.text: Mr. Pilson's rivals at ABC and NBC grimaced at the price.
example.arg: Mr. Pilson 's rivals at ABC and NBC

example.name: somewhat trickier
example.text: Watching Congress sweat and grimace through its annual budget labors, fighting the urge to spend more, we're reminded of those late-night movies in which the anguished serial killer turns himself in to police and says, ``Stop me before I kill again.''
example.arg: fighting the urge to spend more
